1.0.0.name: wordpress/grey-opaque
1.0.0.description: A clear and elegant grey theme - designed for WordPress 3.0 or higher - with some very nice opaque-effects. Contains one sidebar on the right and postinformation on the left side of content. This theme has six widgetareas, two in the right sidebar and four in the footer. It supports all of the WordPress 3.0 (and higher) functions. The themes settings-page allows some customizing. Translations: English, German, Russian (Анастасия / Anastasia), Belarussian, Romanian (Alexander Ovsov), Italian (Andrea), Chinese (Ren Rainer), Slovak, Czech (Josef Šabata)
